channel.title: 2009Remade | A Remade Project | 530
channel.description:
[center][i]- <insert logo here> (Logo soon to come)[/i][/center] [hr] 2009Remade is a remake focused to remake the time that PvP was at its fullest (ranging from stealing creation to bounty hunter to PvP worlds!) and skilling was at its largest (with the release of summoning not too long ago, construction to build your own houses from scratch, who wouldn't want 2009 to be back?). We are a remake not only to simply remake, but to make it quality, with quantity to support. We hope you enjoy!
This project is a sub-project of the 2-project server era attempt, Remade. Remade has two branches, one being [i]2006Remade[/i] (their larger project), and the other being [i]2009Remade[/i]. 2009Remade consists of only 2 developers, [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=468771]Arham 4[/url] of MoparScape and [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=579080]South-Park[/url] of Moparscape, whereas 2006Remade consists of a larger team. 2009Remade is a separate entity of 2006Remade, with a different purpose.
Some people opinionate G.E. or Trade Limits in this era is the cause to make this revision a let down. For a cure to this, we shall make community polls for those updates.
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/6pqagn.png[/img] [hr] [size=18pt][b]Staff Team[/b][/size]
[img]http://www.world901.com/forum/images/red%20owner.png[/img][b] Owner Thomas[/b] - Remade Founder; Remade Owner; 2009Remade Founder, 2009Remade Owner; Head Programmer [img]http://world901.com/forum/images/co%20owner2.png[/img][b] Co-Owner Arham 4[/b] - 2009Remade Founder; 2009Remade Co-Owner; Programmer [hr] [size=18pt][b]Server Development Log[/b][/size]
[code] - (09/04/13) Cleaned XenoRune - (09/08/13) Cooking base added (cooking the items only) - (09/08/13) Food support added - (09/11/13) Agility base added - (09/11/13) Gnome Course added - (09/13/13) Smelting added - (09/14/13) Woodcutting base added (missing birds nest & canoes) - (09/15/13) Mining added (missing shooting star mining) - (09/21/13) Basic fishing (just normal fishing, etc.) - (09/21/13) Global Drops (a bit buggy) - (09/28/13) Dialogue system - (09/28/13) Quest system - (09/28/13) Cook's Assistant - (09/29/13) Sailing & gangplank walking - (10/05/13) Prayer fully complete - (10/05/13) Bounty Hunter being developed - (10/05/13) Added prospecting - (10/05/13) Added Ring of forging - (10/07/13) Added HD - (10/14/13) Glass blowing added - (10/14/13) Spinning added [/code]

item.title: 2009Remade | A Remade Project | 530
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

Docent:

Why not, I can help man.

Alright, I’ll see.

OT: Wrote a new skills system today, will be transferring the skills over to it soon (currently only transferred Woodcutting for testing purposes).

EDIT: Fixed the level up. Before it would flash like 10 random skill icons instead of just the one you leveled. Now it only flashes the skill the was leveled up, it also displays the icon on the chat-box interface.

The reason why the woodcutting icon is gone is because it was flashing while I took the screen shot.

Read full topic

EDIT: If anyone would like to help out with this feel free to PM me![/quote]

Why not, I can help man.
